pages.name: Sweet & Savor
pages.pos: {sw Sweetness}. The precipitated sunlight; from time to time, mead and lead.
pages.neg: {sw Savoriness}. The consolidated sea breeze; from time to time, blood and curd.

pages.name: Astringent & Smooth
pages.pos: {as Astringency}. That is tongue-wrinkling; as if licking a fuzzy vine.
pages.neg: {as Smoothness}. Absence of, or neutralizing astringency.

pages.name: Pungent & Bland
pages.pos: {pu Pungency}. The lightless and flameless fire contained by herbs and spices.
pages.neg: {pu Blandness}. Absence of, or neutralizing pungency.

pages.name: Thick & Thin
pages.pos: {th Thickness}. That not only bewaters, but also sates.
pages.neg: {th Thinness}. That is only effective to satiate thirst.

pages.name: Soothing & Rousing
pages.pos: {so Soothingness}. That ceases the tumult of souls.
pages.neg: {so Rousingness}. That make the affections surge and the winter nights less harsh.
